message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.DB

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper discusses a distributed and decentralized computation paradigm for IoT technologies, which is a key aspect of distributed computing. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): The paper focuses on IoT support software components and data-intensive applications for data processing and analytics, which are related to networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper introduces a platform offering automatic deployment, orchestration, and dynamic configuration of IoT support software components and data-intensive applications, which are key aspects of software engineering. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper discusses a platform that enables plug-and-play integration of new sensor objects and dynamic workload scalability, which are related to systems and control. 
- cs.DB (Databases): The paper mentions the implementation of the platform using several open-source technologies for containerization and implementations of standards, protocols, and services for the IoT, which are related to databases.
